collection.name: A Shy Kid
Laetitia
collection.openText: So she came up with this brilliant idea!

observe.desc: [ {I hope I can find lots of friends here! The kid is shy, so the gift will be given in secret! Farewells are said, so I hope we can play more! And people here don’t smile! They look gloomy! So the little lady decided to stay until she brings laughter in here! I will be happy if everyone is pleased with my pranks!} ]
